column2: We're almost there! One more level! Ready to find the second access fob?
We need to beat the final level in Lightspeed. Launch it now.

Here we are. You'll have to create and beat the final level with every monster and every upgrade.

Press the Flip button to go to the code.

All right, now we need to give it everything. Let's spawn every enemy and Power-up in this level.

Click on the Spawn tab and look at the `spawnEnemy()` function.

Let's change it so it randomly spawns any of the 4 enemies: `'asteroid'`, `'spinner'`, `'squid'` or `'beam'`. I'm ready to give you hints.
See where we return `'asteroid'`? Instead we'll return by using the `pickOne()` function.
Inside the `pickOne()` we will list the 4 enemies, `'asteroid', 'spinner', 'squid', 'beam'`.
So the whole thing should say `return pickOne('asteroid', 'spinner', 'squid', 'beam');`
You should get all 4 enemies in this level.
I don't see all 4 enemies. Let's go back and check.
Excellent. You've got all 4 enemies. Now finish the level. That's how we'll find that second fob!
Well done! I knew you could get us here! And, just as we'd hoped, here's the fob.
This is auspicious indeed! I'm going to head to the Clubhouse and see how this work! See you there.
Go if you must, but I do hope you'll check back later.
